title: How to Start an Urban Homestead (& What NOT to do) Collaboration Series | Hey Its A Good Life

subtasks: Understand the importance of initial preparations
Acquire knowledge about vermiculture (poop as resource)
Consider using grow bags for faster food production
Support pollinators by incorporating native flowers
Prioritize soil care through proper watering methods
Utilize mulch for maintaining soil health and moisture
Maintain a positive attitude for successful gardening
